name: VIR-261.03 Verify that the shopper can select any of the 4 delivery methods

userStory.narrative:
As a customer on the site I would like to see a subtotal
of the order on the pdp as a combination/calculation
of the value tier and the delivery method cost.

title: VIR-261.03 Verify that the shopper can select any of the 4 delivery methods
description:
Examples:
|method|
| Factory (will-call)|
|Standard Delivery (Delivered Tailgate)|
|Inside Service (no installation)|
|Full Service (Delivered & Installed)|
